title: Miniature Portrait of Napoléon Bonaparte
medium: watercolor on ivory; gold metal frame
provenance_text:
Godfrey Manheimer; Leonard A. Dessar [1864-], New York, NY [1]; purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-1930], Pittsburgh, PA, June 21, 1917; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927. 
NOTES: [1] In the 1900 US Census, Dessar's mother, Carrie Manheimer, is listed as being part of Dessar's household. It is possible that Dessar inherited this item through the Manheimer family.

creator.death_place: Paris (Ville de Paris department, Île-de-France, France)
